src:
Selain Bamsoet dan Airlangga, Ada yang Ingin Maju Ketum Golkar
05 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Sekretaris Jenderal Partai Golkar Lodewijk Freidrich Paulus menyebut ada dua kandidat lain yang ingin mencalonkan diri sebagai ketua umum Golkar di musyawarah nasional Desember 2019. Dua orang itu adalah Ridwan Hisjam dan Indra Bambang Utoyo.
"Pasti ada. Karena ada Pak Indra Bambang Utoyo, Pak Ridwan Hisjam, dan sebagainya," kata Lodewijk di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Nama Ridwan Hisjam dan Indra Bambang Utoyo sebelumnya juga disebut oleh para pendukung Bamsoet. Namun dua orang itu tak pernah secara tegas menyatakan atau terlihat bermanuver untuk maju sebagai caketum Golkar.
Menurut Lodewijk, belum diketahui secara pasti siapa saja yang akan mencalonkan diri menjadi ketua umum Golkar. Dia beralasan saat ini belum terbentuk panitia untuk munas dan pendaftaran para calon.
"Kami belum tahu, berapa orang yang pengen maju. Kita tunggu saja saat sudah terbentuk panitia," ujarnya.
Lodewijk mengatakan pencalonan akan dibuka bagi siapa saja, termasuk Bamsoet. Dia enggan berkomentar lebih jauh ihwal adanya kesepakatan antara Wakil Koordinator Bidang Pratama DPP Golkar itu dengan Airlangga Hartarto.
Sebelumnya, sejumlah pendukung Airlangga meminta Bamsoet menepati komitmen tak maju di munas Golkar lantaran sudah menjadi ketua Majelis Permusyawaratan Rakyat. "Mungkin kesepakatan itu ada antara Pak Bambang dan Pak Airlangga. Tentunya kita tunggu saja," ucap Lodewijk.
text:
Aside from Bamsoet and Airlangga, there is someone who wants to advance the Golkar Chairperson
05 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Secretary General of the Golkar Party Lodewijk Freidrich Paulus said there were two other candidates who wanted to run for Golkar general chair in the national conference in December 2019. The two men were Ridwan Hisjam and Indra Bambang Utoyo.
"There must be. Because there are Mr. Indra Bambang Utoyo, Mr. Ridwan Hisjam, and so on," Lodewijk said at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The names Ridwan Hisjam and Indra Bambang Utoyo were also previously mentioned by Bamsoet supporters. However, the two men had never explicitly stated or appeared to be maneuvering to advance as a colkum of Golkar.
According to Lodewijk, it is not known for certain who will run for Golkar's general chair. He reasoned that currently there had not been formed a committee for the General Meeting and registration of the candidates.
"We don't know yet, how many people want to move forward. We'll just wait when the committee is formed," he said.
Lodewijk said the nomination would be open to anyone, including Bamsoet. He was reluctant to comment further on the existence of an agreement between the Deputy Coordinator for the Primary Division of the Golkar DPP and Airlangga Hartarto.
Previously, a number of supporters of Airlangga asked Bamsoet to keep a non-progressive commitment in the Golkar General Assembly because it had become the chair of the People's Consultative Assembly. "Maybe the agreement exists between Mr. Bambang and Mr. Airlangga. Surely we will just wait," Lodewijk said.
